Package org.spongepowered.api.service

Interface ServiceProvider.ServerScoped

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ServiceProvider
    Enclosing interface:
    ServiceProvider
    public static interface ServiceProvider.ServerScoped
extends ServiceProvider
    Provides serivces that are scoped to the ServiceProvider.ServerScoped Engine only.
